title: Fix backend canister + full UI/UX polish sweep

requirements.summary: Redesign Home page with improved visual hierarchy, impactful hero section, polished per-tier stat cards with glowing borders, cleaner top-3 preview, and better spacing throughout
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section has a compelling headline and subtext with strong visual presence
Per-tier stat cards display tier colors with subtle glow effects
Top-3 preview section is clearly laid out with player name, tier badge, and score visible
Admin access button is visible and styled consistently with the gaming theme
Page looks polished and professional on both desktop and mobile

file_operations.description: Redesign the Home page with an impactful hero section featuring a prominent tagline and improved typography. Replace the current per-tier stat cards with polished card components that include glowing accent borders using each tier's color from TIER_CONFIG. Enhance the top-3 preview section with improved card layout showing player name, tier badge, and score more prominently. Improve overall spacing, use larger headings for the hero, and ensure the admin access button is clearly visible but visually integrated. Apply responsive design patterns for mobile and desktop views.

requirements.summary: Polish Tier List page and TierRow component with stronger glow/gradient effects on tier labels, enhanced player card hover effects, improved empty-state styling, and refined category filter integration
acceptanceCriteria: Tier label badges have vivid glow/gradient effects per tier color
Player cards have visible hover states (scale or glow effect)
Empty-state message is styled and readable when no players exist
Category filter bar is visually polished and clearly shows the active selection
Layout is responsive and readable on all screen sizes

file_operations.description: Refine the Tier List page layout by improving spacing between tier rows, enhancing the category filter visual integration at the top of the page, and ensuring the page responds cleanly on mobile. Add better container styling and improve the overall visual hierarchy.

Redesign the tier label badge with stronger glow and gradient effects matching each tier's accent color from TIER_CONFIG. Apply vivid box-shadow and background gradient styling to make tier labels more prominent. Improve the empty-state message styling with better typography and color. Ensure the player card grid layout is responsive and visually balanced.

Add visible hover effects to player cards using CSS transitions for scale or glow effects. Enhance the card's base styling with better shadows and borders. Ensure hover states are smooth and tie into the tier color scheme from TIER_CONFIG. Improve spacing and typography within the card for better readability.

requirements.summary: Polish Leaderboard page with ranked table featuring alternating row highlights, gold/silver/bronze styling for top 3 positions, improved tier badges, better column headers, hover effects, and polished empty-state view
acceptanceCriteria: Top 3 rank positions have gold, silver, bronze styled number badges
Table rows have subtle hover highlight effect
Tier badges in each row use the correct tier accent color
Column headers are bold and clearly readable
Empty state is styled with an informative message
Category filter is visually consistent with the Tier List page filter

file_operations.description: Redesign the ranked table with alternating row background colors for better readability. Add special styling for rank positions 1, 2, and 3 using gold, silver, and bronze color badges respectively. Implement hover effects on table rows with subtle highlight transitions. Improve column header styling with bold text and better spacing. Enhance tier badge display in each row to use the correct tier accent color from TIER_CONFIG. Add a polished empty-state view with an informative message when no players exist. Ensure the category filter bar is visually consistent with the Tier List page. Make the table responsive on smaller screens.

requirements.summary: Polish AdminModal component with refined dark card design, better form field styling, clearer success/error notifications, improved player list layout, and prominent logout button with proper scrolling
acceptanceCriteria: Modal card has a polished dark background with subtle border
All form inputs and selects have consistent dark-themed styling
Success notification is visually distinct (e.g. green accent)
Error messages are clearly styled in red/destructive color
Player list rows are readable with name, tier, category, score, and delete button
Modal body scrolls independently when content overflows
Logout button is clearly visible at bottom or top of the management UI

file_operations.description: Improve the modal's visual design with a more refined dark card background and subtle border. Style all form inputs and select elements with consistent dark-themed styling using border, background, and text colors that match the gaming theme. Make success notifications visually distinct with a green accent color and appropriate icon or styling. Style error messages clearly in red/destructive color. Improve the player list section with better row layout showing name, tier, category, score, and delete button in a readable format. Ensure the modal body scrolls independently when the player list is long by applying appropriate overflow styles. Add or enhance the logout button to be more prominent and clearly visible at the top or bottom of the management UI. Preserve the existing password gate (65515616151) without changes.

requirements.summary: Polish Navbar component with improved active link highlighting, refined search input styling, better mobile menu appearance, and a subtle separator at the bottom
acceptanceCriteria: Active navigation link is clearly highlighted with the HT1 accent color or an underline indicator
Search input has consistent dark-themed styling with a visible placeholder
Mobile hamburger menu opens and closes cleanly with styled links
Navbar has a visible bottom separator line or gradient
Logo/brand area is visually prominent

file_operations.description: Improve active link highlighting by applying the HT1 accent color or an underline indicator to the currently active route. Refine the search input styling to match the dark gaming theme with better border, background, and placeholder visibility. Enhance the mobile menu appearance with cleaner styling for links and improved open/close transitions. Add a subtle bottom border or gradient line to the navbar to separate it from page content. Ensure the logo/brand area is visually prominent with appropriate sizing and styling.

requirements.summary: Polish CategoryFilter component with improved button sizing, spacing, clear active state styling, hover effects on inactive buttons, and responsive wrapping on small screens
acceptanceCriteria: Active category button has a clear filled/glowing style distinct from inactive buttons
Inactive buttons have a visible hover effect
Buttons wrap onto multiple lines on small screens without breaking layout
All 9 options (All + 8 categories) are visible and readable

file_operations.description: Improve button sizing and spacing for better visual balance. Enhance the active category button styling with a clear filled or glowing effect that is distinct from inactive buttons, using the tier-ht1 accent color or similar prominent styling. Add visible hover effects to inactive buttons with subtle color transitions. Ensure the filter bar wraps cleanly onto multiple lines on smaller screens using responsive flex wrapping without breaking the layout. Verify all 9 options (All + 8 categories) remain visible and readable across all screen sizes.
